item.description:
Hello everyone!! I had such a good time at the last meetup, I can't wait for the one in March.

We will hold it on Sunday, March 8th from 11am to 1pm at Best Friends in Wakefield. Please remember if it is your first time, to check in at the front desk and provide proof of vaccines for the rabies, distemper and canine cough vaccines.

If anyone would like to schedule a grooming for after the meetup, please let me know no later than Saturday, March 7th so I can be sure to have my groomer here.

Retail will be 20% off for all attendees of the meetup.

Looking forward to seeing new faces too!! Any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Agni
Center Manager
Best Friends Wakefield

group.name: The Wakefield Active Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: March Active Dog Meetup
